reviewText: I don't speak French so this was a little stretch, but it was interesting to watch although pretty unbelievable and formulaic.
Fantastic ! Impossible to find it in France !

Just so you all know, this is one of the great French films of all time. A star at film festivals.
Very sweet, clever and warm story, completely well acted. A subtle and gentle film.
I cannot speak for the quality of this DVD, but with classics this age, this may be the best transfer available. When I saw the film projected onto a screen, you had to make adjustments for the fact that the print was not in excellent condition.
No english subtitles as far as I can see.
BEAUTIFUL film but dvd awful! I think it's a copy of VHS.
